description: This Java source file defines the abstract class ProcessorHelper, which provides helper methods for code generation and analysis in a plugin architecture related to IPC (Inter-Process Communication). It includes methods for checking language support, and retrieving native function names associated with variables, specifically for Pojo and Event types.

classes.name: ProcessorHelper
classes.description: An abstract class providing helper methods for code generation and analysis related to IPC components, including support for multiple programming languages and native function name retrieval.

methods.name: analyze
methods.description: Abstract method to be implemented for analyzing the ICService object within a given context, typically for initialization purposes.

methods.name: getWrappers
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve an iterator over Wrapper instances, representing different code generation targets or language implementations.

methods.name: shouldGenerateJava
methods.description: Checks if any Wrapper supports generating Java code by inspecting included language masks.

methods.name: shouldGenerateC
methods.description: Checks if any Wrapper supports generating native C code by inspecting included language masks.

methods.name: getNativeConstructorForVar
methods.description: Retrieves the native constructor function name for a given variable if it's associated with Pojo or Event, via the getCreateFunctionName method.

methods.name: getNativeDestructorForVar
methods.description: Retrieves the native destructor function name for a variable, similar to constructor but for destruction, via getDestroyFunctionName.

methods.name: getNativeDestructorForVarFromList
methods.description: Retrieves a specific 'destroy from list' function name for the variable, if applicable.

methods.name: getNativeDestructorForVarFromMap
methods.description: Retrieves a 'destroy from map' function name for the variable, if applicable.

methods.name: getNativeEncodeForVar
methods.description: Gets the native encode function name for a variable.

methods.name: getNativeDecodeForVar
methods.description: Gets the native decode function name for a variable.
